name: Invictus: In the Shadow of Olympus
description: Command legendary heroes from the Greek mythologyCreate you own war host from over 30 distinct unitsA vast scenery - from hot deserts to cold, dead mountains
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Windows Vista Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 880 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0
